title: Reapers Creed MC : Damon's Salvation
description: When Reapers Creed's single, sexy VP, Damon,has one night with a trick, the impossible becomes reality.Lyra, a slave for Los Diablos MC, needs to find a way to escape her terrible life. One night she gets offered to please a client. Can she work this to her advantage? Get the freedom she so desperately wants?
author: Ana Rosso
